title: I really dislike "s'" instead of "s's"
body:
Because when you state possession, you sort of add the 'es' sound on.

E.g. Arthas's is said as "Arthas-es"

When you take away the 's and leave just a ', it feels like you've mutilated the word.

E.g. Arthas' is still said as "Arthas-es" but it's just like, not complete.

Ya know?

s' isn't wrong (I think it's an American thing, typical) but please use s's.

Trigger warnings: punctuation
